body:
The following failures should be fixed

**Sanity tests**
```
target grpc_trace (src/core/lib/debug/trace.c) does not name header grpc/grpc.h as a dependency
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "tools/run_tests/sanity/check_sources_and_headers.py", line 105, in <module>
    assert errors == 0
AssertionError
```

**`gRPC PR Bazel Basic` failures:**
test/core/iomgr/BUILD has `ev_epoll_linux_test` target. This should be renamed to `ev_epollsig_linux_test`.


**`gRPC portability PR linux`:** (and Interop PR)
```
/var/local/git/grpc/objs/dbg/src/core/lib/iomgr/timer_generic.o src/core/lib/iomgr/timer_generic.c
src/core/lib/iomgr/tcp_uv.c:55:5: error: conflicting types for 'grpc_tcp_trace'
 int grpc_tcp_trace = 0;
     ^
In file included from src/core/lib/iomgr/tcp_uv.c:50:0:
./src/core/lib/iomgr/tcp_uv.h:52:25: note: previous declaration of 'grpc_tcp_trace' was here
 extern grpc_tracer_flag grpc_tcp_trace;
                         ^
Makefile:2522: recipe for target '/var/local/git/grpc/objs/dbg/src/core/lib/iomgr/tcp_uv.o' failed
make: *** [/var/local/git/grpc/objs/dbg/src/core/lib/iomgr/tcp_uv.o] Error 1
make: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
```

replace %ld with %zd here:
```
src/core/lib/iomgr/ev_epoll_thread_pool_linux.c: In function 'add_fd_to_eps':
src/core/lib/iomgr/ev_epoll_thread_pool_linux.c:1170:3: error: format '%ld' expects argument of type 'long int', but argument 6 has type 'size_t' [-Werror=format=]
   GRPC_POLLING_TRACE("add_fd_to_eps (fd: %d, eps idx = %ld)", fd->fd, idx);
   ^
cc1: all warnings being treated as errors
```
